Package org.jhotdraw.samples.svg

A sample drawing editor with limited support for Scalable Vector Graphics Mobile 1.2 (SVG Mobile 1.2).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Gradient Represents an SVG Gradient.
 

Class Summary
LinearGradient Represents an SVG LinearGradient.
Main Main.
PathTool Tool to scribble a SVGPath
RadialGradient Represents an SVG RadialGradient.
SVGApplet This is the base class for concrete implementations of SVG drawing applets.
SVGApplicationModel SVGApplicationModel.
SVGAttributeKeys SVGAttributeKeys.
SVGConstants SVGConstants.
SVGCreateFromFileTool A tool to create new figures from an input file.
SVGDrawingPanel JSVGDrawingAppletPanel.
SVGDrawingPanelBeanInfo The BeanInfo for SVGDrawingPanel.
SVGView A view for SVG drawings.
 

Enum Summary
SVGAttributeKeys.TextAlign  
SVGAttributeKeys.TextAnchor  
 

Package org.jhotdraw.samples.svg Description

A sample drawing editor with limited support for Scalable Vector Graphics Mobile 1.2 (SVG Mobile 1.2).
